item.title: Wc plus drop
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

use that then use:

DropTo(2,28);

and in your main loop put

SetupSRL;

item.title: Wc plus drop
item.dc:creator: @oliver1205 oliver1205
item.description:
@oliver1205 wrote:

for your dropping procedure, use this

procedure DropLogs;
var
rx, ry, m, n : Integer;
begin
Status(‘Dropping Logs’);
Gametab(4)
begin
for M:=1 to 7 do
begin
for n:=1 to 4 do
begin
rx := 544 + (n * 42)
ry := 192 + (m * 36)
mmouse(rx, ry, 0, 0)
wait(100 + random(100));
if (IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Wield’, 100)) or
(IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Search Bird’, 100)) or
(IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Use Knife’, 100)) or
(IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Use Tinder’, 100)) then
Chopped := Chopped - 1;
if not (IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Wield’, 100)) and
not (IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Use Knife’, 100)) and
not (IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Search Bird’, 100)) and
not (IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Use Tinder’, 100)) then
begin
getmousepos(x, y)
mouse(x, y, 5, 5, false);
wait(100 + random(50));
if(ClickText(‘Drop’, MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2))then
begin
wait(150 + random(210));
end else
mmouse(233, 123, 50, 50)
end;
end;
end;
end;

Read full topic

item.title: Wc plus drop
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

nueb35:

when i put mouse it says Unknown identifier 'mouse' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\wc3.scar

Add this line just under the program line:
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Read full topic

item.title: Wc plus drop
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

ok i found a problem…

between your

Begin

And

Chop

Put a ActivateClient;

ActivateClient; is…

It automaticlly goes to the RS window (or the window you put the cross hair on) and starts!
So you dont have to click on it. (like this—

Begin
ActivateClient;
Chop

like that!

Read full topic

item.title: Wc plus drop
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

Nice first script! Now, to make it even better, use SRL. its an include with a bunch of functions that are highly undetectable by runescape. Here are soem things you could do:

Replace

movemouse(635, 325) wait(100+random(300)) clickmouse(635, 325,false)

with

[code]Mouse(x,y,3,3,true);]/code]

~This mouse movment is a very complex one taht it also very humanlike! the 3 is a random number added to the position you move the mouse. true if if you want to left click.

And there are a lot of otehr thingsi n SRL to make that script alot better, including antirandoms. So nice first script![/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Wc plus drop
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

Fix/Upgrade few things…

[scar]
program New;
[/scar]
Give your program a name!

[scar]
movemousesmooth(x,y);
[/scar]
From what I heard, movemousesmooth is detectable.

item.title: Wc plus drop
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

my frist script is wood cutteer plus droper change the first color and the second color to the 2 colors of the tree u wanna chop and put ur brighness on verry bright there are no random!!

[scar]{///////////////////////////////////////////////////
||| || || || ||||||| ||||| |||||| |||||| //
|||| || || || || || || || || //
|| || || || || ||||| ||||| |||| ||||| //
|| |||| || || || || || || || //
|| ||| |||||| ||||||| ||||| |||||| ||||| //
}///////////////////////////////////////////////////

program New;
procedure chop;
var x,y,x1,y1,x2,y2,inv,secondcolor,firstcolor:integer;
begin
repeat
////////////TREE COLORS!///////////
firstcolor:=4550264; //
secondcolor:=4550264; //
///////////////////////////////////
{do not tuch below!!! or else}
inv:=4345174;
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,firstcolor,11, 63,524, 398))then
begin
movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(100+random(300));
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(15000+random(300));
end else
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x1,y1,secondcolor,11, 63,524, 398))then
movemouse(x1,y1)
wait(100+random(300))
clickmouse(x1,y1,true)
wait(15000+random(300))
end;
until(not(findcolorspiral(x2,y2,inv,727, 502,727, 502)));
end;
procedure drop;
Begin
/////////////////////////////2
movemouse(595, 327)
wait(100+random(300))
clickmouse(595, 327,false)
wait(100+random(300))
movemouse(582, 371)
wait(100+random(300));
clickmouse(582, 371,true);
/////////////////////////////3
movemouse(595, 362)
wait(100+random(300))
clickmouse(595, 362,false)
wait(100+random(300))
movemouse(582, 405)
wait(100+random(300));
clickmouse(582, 405,true);
/////////////////////////////4
movemouse(596, 399)
wait(100+random(300))
clickmouse(596, 399,false)
wait(100+random(300))
movemouse(580, 441)
wait(100+random(300));
clickmouse(580, 441,true);
/////////////////////////////5
movemouse(596, 436)
wait(100+random(300))
clickmouse(596, 436,false)
wait(100+random(300))
movemouse(580, 480)
wait(100+random(300));
clickmouse(580, 480,true);
/////////////////////////////6

wait(100+random(300))
clickmouse(592, 470,false)
wait(100+random(300))
movemouse(584, 488)
wait(100+random(300));
clickmouse(584, 488,true);
///////////////////////////// 7

wait(100+random(300))

wait(100+random(300))

begin
